main event: A bright, star-like, diamond-shaped object was observed blinking on and off and moving from northeast to southwest, disappearing over the horizon.
interesting points: Witnesses reported the object hovering or maneuvering rather than in rapid flight,The object emitted a bright glow or light and was described as about the size of a car,It was visible for about 10-15 minutes at an altitude of approximately 1000-2000 feet,The descriptions from witnesses were somewhat confused and contradictory,One witness observed the object from a rural area while driving.
sighted object: bright, star-like, diamond-shaped object emitting light
witness description: The witness observed the object while driving at night and described it as oval-shaped with a pulsating light.
